mapper.select: SELECT model_id as modelId, model_name as modelName, model_desc as modelDesc, model_type as modelType FROM data_model WHERE project_id = #{projectId} ORDER BY model_id desc

SELECT dm.model_id AS modelId, dm.model_name AS modelName, dp.project_name AS projectName, dm.resource_num AS resourceNum, sum( dm.latest_alignment_cost + dm.latest_analyze_cost + dm.latest_feature_cost + dm.latest_sample_cost + dm.latest_train_cost + dm.latest_lack_cost + dm.latest_exception_cost ) AS totalTime, dm.latest_task_status AS latestTaskStatus FROM data_model dm, data_project dp WHERE dm.project_id = dp.id and dm.is_draft = 1
GROUP BY dm.model_id, dm.model_name, dm.resource_num, dm.latest_task_status, dp.project_name ORDER BY dm.model_id desc LIMIT #{offset},#{pageSize}
SELECT count(dm.model_id) FROM data_model dm, data_project dp WHERE dm.project_id = dp.id and dm.is_draft = 1

SELECT model_id as modelId, model_name as modelName, model_desc as modelDesc, model_type as modelType, project_id as projectId, resource_num as resourceNum, y_value_column as yValueColumn, is_draft as isDraft, latest_task_id as latestTaskId, latest_cost_time as latestCostTime, latest_task_status as latestTaskStatus, latest_alignment_ratio as latestAlignmentRatio, latest_alignment_cost as latestAlignmentCost, latest_analyze_ratio as latestAnalyzeRatio, latest_analyze_cost as latestAnalyzeCost, latest_feature_ratio as latestFeatureRatio, latest_feature_cost as latestFeatureCost, latest_sample_ratio as latestSampleRatio, latest_sample_cost as latestSampleCost, latest_train_ratio as latestTrainRatio, latest_train_cost as latestTrainCost, latest_lack_ratio as latestLackRatio, latest_lack_cost as latestLlackCost, latest_exception_ratio as latestExceptionRatio, latest_exception_cost as latestExceptionCost, create_date as createDate FROM data_model WHERE model_id = #{modelId}
SELECT resource_id as resourceId FROM data_mr WHERE model_id = #{modelId} and task_id = #{taskId}

SELECT quota_id as quotaId, quota_type as quotaType, quota_images as quotaImage, auc as auc, ks as ks, gini as gini, `precision` as `precision`, recall as recall, f1_score as f1Score FROM data_model_quota WHERE model_id = #{modelId}

select id, model_id as modelId, task_id as taskId, predict_file as predictFile, predict_content as predictContent, component_json as componentJson from data_model_task where task_id = #{taskId}

select id, model_id as modelId, task_id as taskId, predict_file as predictFile, predict_content as predictContent, component_json as componentJson from data_model_task where model_id = #{modelId} ORDER BY id desc LIMIT #{offset},#{pageSize}
